LanguageData.RK_Axe.label: Ratkin axe
LanguageData.RK_Axe.description: An axe made for cutting trees. It is a little small, but the wielder will be able to cut down trees faster.
LanguageData.RK_Axe.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.RK_Axe.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.RK_Cleaver.label: Ratkin cleaver
LanguageData.RK_Cleaver.description: A knife made for cutting meat. It allows the wielder to get more meat when butchering. It does not seem to be a good weapon.
LanguageData.RK_Cleaver.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.RK_Cleaver.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.RK_Hockey.label: Ratkin hoe
LanguageData.RK_Hockey.description: A hoe made for digging up fields. It makes it easier to dig up the earth and plant seeds.
LanguageData.RK_Hockey.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.RK_Hockey.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.RK_Fork.label: Ratkin pitchfork
LanguageData.RK_Fork.description: A pitchfork. It making piles straw and moving hay more convenient.
LanguageData.RK_Fork.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.RK_Fork.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.RK_LongSword.label: Ratkin guardener longsword
LanguageData.RK_LongSword.description: A sword used by Guardeners defending their fields. It is a sharp weapon, making it easier to defeat enemies in the defense of the land.
LanguageData.RK_LongSword.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.RK_LongSword.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.RK_Crossbow.label: Ratkin cross bow
LanguageData.RK_Crossbow.description: A simple crossbow. It is traditionally used for hunting.
LanguageData.RK_Crossbow.tools.0.label: limb
LanguageData.RK_Crossbow.tools.1.label: arrow
LanguageData.Bolt_RK_Crossbow.label: crossbow bolt
LanguageData.RK_EnhanceCrossBow.label: Ratkin enhanced cross bow
LanguageData.RK_EnhanceCrossBow.description: An improved crossbow. Its bolts travel further and penetrate thick hides or armor easier than its simpler counterpart.
LanguageData.RK_EnhanceCrossBow.tools.0.label: limb
LanguageData.RK_EnhanceCrossBow.tools.1.label: arrow
LanguageData.Bolt_RK_EnhanceCrossBow.label: crossbow bolt
LanguageData.RK_AutoCrossBow.label: Ratkin autocross bow
LanguageData.RK_AutoCrossBow.description: A semi-automatic crossbow. You can fire bolts at high speeds from its magazine.
LanguageData.RK_AutoCrossBow.tools.0.label: limb
LanguageData.RK_AutoCrossBow.tools.1.label: arrow
LanguageData.Bolt_RK_AutoCrossBow.label: crossbow bolt
LanguageData.RK_Rifle.label: Ratkin rifle
LanguageData.RK_Rifle.description: A rifle made for Ratkins. It was made to imitate a human rifle. It has a longer range than a crossbow and comes with a bayonet for use in close combat.
LanguageData.RK_Rifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RK_Rifle.tools.1.label: bayonet
LanguageData.Bullet_RK_Rifle.label: rifle bullet
LanguageData.RK_SniperRifle.label: Ratkin sniper rifle
LanguageData.RK_SniperRifle.description: A rifle with a Ratkin-developed telescopic sight. It can aim farther away, it gets less accurate the closer a target comes.
LanguageData.RK_SniperRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RK_SniperRifle.tools.1.label: bayonet
LanguageData.Bullet_RK_SniperRifle.label: rifle bullet
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteRifle.label: Ratkin flechette rifle
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteRifle.description: A rifle that uses flechette-type bullets. It sacrifices range in order to have increased armor penetration. It comes with a bayonet for use in close combat.
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteRifle.tools.1.label: bayonet
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteRifle.tools.2.label: flechette
LanguageData.Bullet_RK_FlechetteRifle.label: flechette
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteSniperRifle.label: Ratkin flechette sniper rifle
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteSniperRifle.description: A rifle with a Ratkin-developed telescopic sight that uses flechette-type bullets. It can penetrate armor at a long distance. It comes with a bayonet for use in close combat.
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteSniperRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteSniperRifle.tools.1.label: bayonet
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteSniperRifle.tools.2.label: flechette
LanguageData.Bullet_RK_FlechetteSniperRifle.label: flechette
LanguageData.RK_Rifle_line.label: ratkin shotgun
LanguageData.RK_Rifle_line.description: A sawed-off shotgun. Used in Ratkin kingdoms, they are typically used between Ratkins in territory disputes.
LanguageData.RK_Rifle_line.verbs.0.label: Buck fire
LanguageData.RK_Rifle_line.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RK_Rifle_line.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.RK_Rifle_line.tools.2.label: bayonet
LanguageData.Bullet_RK_Buck.label: Buck bullet
LanguageData.Bullet_RK_Slug.label: Slug bullet
